events.description: Weekend fish market — households rush to buy fresh catch
Monday morning — slow start to the week
Wave 2: Three new families join (recommended by neighbors)
New families earn trust: shops open lines to them
Peak fishing season — producers and retail booming
Wave 3: New boat mechanic joins (referred by Marina & Boat Services)
Winter approaches — tourism drops, activity slows
The Stavkovi family moves to the city
Spring festival — community celebration, big spending day
